name: df-drng
body: |- wceq(cdr, crab(s0, crg, wceq(cfv(cui, cv(s0)), cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ DivRing = { s0 ∈ Ring |(Unit ` s0)=((Base ` s0)\ {(0 ` s0)})}
comment: Define class of all division rings. A division ring is a ring in which the set of units is exactly the nonzero elements of the ring. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)
